Add credit feature and also increasse threshold

To add credits to your account, you can use the Prepay option. For increasing the billing threshold, you would need to use the Autopay option. Here are the steps for both:
1. **Adding Credits (Prepay):**
   - Log in to your NewsBreak Ad Manager account.
   - Navigate to the Billing section.
   - Select 'Add Credits' and follow the prompts to add funds to your account.
2. **Increasing Billing Threshold (Autopay):**
   - Log in to your NewsBreak Ad Manager account.
   - Navigate to the Billing section.
   - Ensure you have a valid credit card on file.
   - The system will automatically charge your card when the billing threshold is met or at the end of the month.
For more detailed information, you can refer to our Billing Guide here: [Billing Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide).
change the industry of ad account

To change the industry of your ad account, you will need to access the Account Management section. Here are the steps you can follow:
1. Access Account Management.
2. Switch over to the 'Ad Accounts' tab.
3. Click on your preferred Ad account.
4. Edit the industry information as needed.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to our Account Management Guide [here](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide). If you encounter any issues, please contact adsupport@newsbreak.com.
